TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit ReadOnlySpan`1/Enumerator<T> extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 提供 項目的列舉值。

span.span: Provides an enumerator for the elements of a .

remarks.format: C# [foreach](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/foreach-in.md) C# 語言和[每個...下一步](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/for-each-next-statement.md)建構在 Visual Basic 中的會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The C# [foreach](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/foreach-in.md) of the C# language and the [For Each...Next](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/for-each-next-statement.md) construct in Visual Basic hides the complexity of enumerators. 而不要直接操作列舉值，並使用`foreach`或`For Each...Next`建議。Instead of directly manipulating the enumerator, using `foreach` or `For Each...Next` is recommended. 一開始，列舉值位於第一個元素之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the . 在這個位置上， 並未定義。At this position, is undefined. 您必須呼叫列舉值前進到中的第一個項目讀取的值之前。You must call to advance the enumerator to the first item in the before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的值，直到呼叫。 returns the same value until is called. 設定中的下一個項目。 sets to the next item in the . 如果通過結尾，傳回`false`。If passes the end of the , returns `false`. 列舉值位於此狀態，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`和是未定義。When the enumerator is at this state, subsequent calls to also return `false` and is undefined. 您無法設定中的第一個項目一次; 您必須改為建立新的列舉值執行個體。You cannot set to the first item in the again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 雖然配置在堆疊上，在其上的基礎資料點，可能無法。Though the is allocated on the stack, the underlying data on which the points to, may not be. 因此，列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Therefore, enumerating through a is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要保證列舉期間的執行緒安全，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you must implement your own synchronization. 不同於在.NET 中，某些其他列舉值結構:Unlike some other enumerator structures in .NET, the : - 不會實作或介面。Does not implement the or interface. 這是因為已[ref struct](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/ref.md#ref-struct-types)和無法進行 boxed 處理。This is because is a [ref struct](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/ref.md#ref-struct-types) and cannot be boxed. - 不包含`Reset`方法，可以將列舉值設定為在範圍中第一個項目之前，其初始位置。Does not include a `Reset` method, which can set the enumerator to its initial position before the first element in the span. (方法必須實作此介面的一部分，但大部分的實作者會擲回例外狀況，或不提供任何實作。)(The method must be implemented as part of the interface, but most implementors either throw an exception or provide no implementation.)

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Current As T&
public: property T& ^ Current { T& ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得位於目前列舉值位置的項目參考。

span.span: Gets a reference to the item at the current position of the enumerator.

value.span: 中位於目前列舉值位置的項目。

span.span: The element in the at the current position of the enumerator.

remarks.format: `Current` 未定義下的下列條件：`Current` is undefined under either of the following conditions: - 立即建立列舉值之後，將列舉值位於範圍中的第一個元素之前。Immediately after the enumerator is created, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the span. 將列舉值前進至範圍的第一個項目，再讀取的值時必須呼叫`Current`。 must be called to advance the enumerator to the first element of the span before reading the value of `Current`. - 在上次呼叫傳回`false`，表示範圍結尾。The last call to returned `false`, which indicates the end of the span. `Current` 會傳回相同的值，直到呼叫。`Current` returns the same value until is called. 設定`Current`範圍中的下一個項目。 sets `Current` to the next item in the span.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool MoveNext() cil managed

summary.span: 將列舉值前移至 的下一個項目。

span.span: Advances the enumerator to the next item of the .

returns.span: 如果列舉值成功前移至下一個項目，則為 `true`；如果已傳遞範圍結尾，則為 `false`。

span.span: `true` if the enumerator successfully advanced to the next item; `false` if the end of the span has been passed.

remarks.format: 建立列舉值之後，將它放在範圍內，且第一個呼叫的第一個元素之前`MoveNext`將列舉值前移至範圍中的第一個項目。After an enumerator is created, it is positioned before the first element in the span, and the first call to `MoveNext` advances the enumerator to the first item in the span. 如果`MoveNext`傳遞的範圍內，結尾`MoveNext`傳回`false`。If `MoveNext` passes the end of the span, `MoveNext` returns `false`. 列舉值位於此狀態，後續呼叫`MoveNext`也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this state, subsequent calls to `MoveNext` also return `false`.
